title: Cartan pair
summary: In the mathematical fields of Lie theory and algebraic topology, the notion of Cartan pair is a technical condition on the relationship between a reductive Lie algebra g {\displaystyle {\mathfrak {g}}} and a subalgebra k {\displaystyle {\mathfrak {k}}} reductive in g {\displaystyle {\mathfrak {g}}} .
